title: Mark Aguiar | Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis
snippet: Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis: Pursuing an Economy that works for all of us. ... Mark Aguiar is a consultant at the Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis and the Walker Professor of Economics and International Finance at Princeton University.

title: Publications at Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis
snippet: "Pareto Improving Fiscal and Monetary Policies: Samuelson in the New Keynesian Model," Staff Report 646, Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis. Mark A. Aguiar & Manuel Amador & Cristina Arellano, 2023.

title: CV
snippet: Aguiar, Mark, Manuel Amador, and Doireann Fitzgerald (2025): “Tariff Wars and Net Foreign Asset Positions”. Amador, Manuel, and Javier Bianchi (2025): “Helicopter Drops and Liquidity Traps”. Amador, Manuel, and Christopher Phelan (2025): “Central Bank Reputation with Noise”.
